    Data Science
    30-11-2020 / Edit on Github
    1. Services & API
    2. Frameworks

    Services & API #

    1. Mapbox -- Precise location data and powerful developer tools to change the way we navigate the world.
    2. OpenStreetMap -- a map of the world, created by people like you and free to use under an open license.
    3. Foursquare -- the trusted location data.

    Frameworks #

    1. D3js (Data-Driven Documents)
    2. Caffe -- deep learning framework.

    Python libs #

    • CSAPS -- a Python package for univariate, multivariate and n-dimensional grid data approximation using cubic smoothing splines. The package can be useful in practical engineering tasks for data approximation and smoothing.
    • daft -- a Python package that uses matplotlib to render pixel-perfect probabilistic graphical models for publication in a journal or on the internet.

    R libs #

    later!

    Tools #

    1. TensorFlow Playground
    2. Observale -- Observable is the magic notebook for exploring data and thinking with code.
    3. Travis-CI -- a hosted continuous integration service used to build and test software projects hosted at GitHub and Bitbucket.
